description:
This is a collection of basic boolean logic tasks with two variables. In moste cases you must build logical clauses with 'and' and 'or' to achive the correct outcome .
Pay attention to the information you are given and write logic that conforms to the variables you are given and the end goal

tasks.description: Write a statement that is true if either variable A or B is true
tasks.info: The logical OR operator (||) returns true if either operand is true.
